title: Ticket #6839: Add regression tests for new JobEvent(Log) APIs
description:
We should add regression tests for

  • __str__()
  • __repr__()
  • __enter__() and __exit__()
  • close()
remarks:
2018-Dec-31 14:18:59 by tlmiller:
Since we've never specified what order sPrintAd() produces the attributes in, I think it's OK not to document that they're now alphabetical, especially if we decide to change it back.
check_ins: 2018-Dec-28 17:39   Check-in [55931]: (#6839) Implement tests for the Python JobEventLog's __str__(), __enter__() and __exit__(), and close(). (By Todd L Miller )
creator: tlmiller
